```{r}

d = 2
s = 600
r = 3
m = 100
t = 1
X = matrix(rnorm(n*d), n, d)
```

```{r}
cl = makeCluster(8)
microbenchmark({
  U = subsample(X, s, method = "kmeans")
  Z = cross_similarity(X, U, r, cl=cl)
  eigenpairs = truncated_SVD(Z)
},
times = 10)
stopCluster(cl)
```

